content:
During the last day, the Aviation of Defense forces has struck 9 areas of concentration of personnel, weapons and enemy military equipment.

About thisinformsThe General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

The missile troops were affected by:

  • 1 Air Defense Defense Remedy,
  • 1 artillery tool,
  • 1 Station of Reb,
  • 1 area of personnel concentration,
  • 1 UAV control stations of the enemy.

"At the same time, our warriors continue to be active in the occupation troops of losses in living strength and equipment, depleting the enemy along the entire line of combat collision," the message reads.

As reportedArmyinform, in the day at the front - more than half a hundred ammunition, the enemy attacks in six directions.
title: Ukrainian warriors have struck the occupants and disposed of many enemy equipment
description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about it. The missile troops were caught ...
author: Army Inform
